name: The Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki Evolution
storyline:
Part 2 of the Eiyuu Densetsu VII dualogy remake, with the first title being Eiyuu Densetsu: Zero No Kiseki Evolution, Ao No Kiseki completes the story that once captivated PSP owners who enjoy RPGs with an anime flair.

For this new entry, by taking advantage of the Vita's advanced capabilities, gameplay has been enhanced along with the addition of full voice acting for all characters! In addition to these new changes, Ao No Kiseki will have new anime sequences, high res character images and visuals, and newly arranged music. This is not a mere port, but a complete remake for today's contemporary tastes.

The story continues off from Zero no Kiseki, where protagonist Lloyd Bannings continues the search for his brother's killer. In this continuing quest, he finds more than he bargins for, whether it be new dangers or new emotional changes in his life though the friends he meets along the way.
summary: The Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki Evolution is the remake version of the original Ao no Kiseki PSP game. This version of the game features full voice acting, new side quests and mini-games, updated graphics and a new rearranged soundtrack.
